name: Blipchat
description: Expose Hipchat conversation history to non-Hipchat users.

HIPCHAT_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Required to access the Hipchat History API.

HIPCHAT_ROOM_ID.description: The Hipchat Room ID of the room that should be displayed.

BASIC_AUTH_USERNAME.description: The HTTP Basic Auth username required for authentication.

BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: The HTTP Basic Auth password required for authentication.
